results.content:
One of the best Packt publishing courses I have taken to date. Raoni explains each Angular concept well and illustrates many in very clear and helpful example projects. These projects teach not only the essential concepts in Angular, but expose the student to Bootstrap themes and custom styling as well. The review sections of the various components of AngularJS help to solidify the concepts learned in the projects. Having a small introduction to writing unit and end to end tests was a great bonus as well. 

Would definitely recommend this course to a friend, and look forward to more courses by Raoni in the future.

results.content:
If you have little time and want to get just a basic idea of what AngularJS is about, this course is ok for that. 
However, there is no feedback from the author, so you aer left on your own, more or less, if you have any questions.
